frames_text.frame_text:
Quickly and naturally
unblock your nose in less
than three minutes.

Start by blowing your nose
and shaking the bottle.

Hold the bottle upright with
thumb under base & nozzle
between two fingers.

Lean the head forward
slightly and insert the
nozzle into the nostril.

Spray while breathing in gently through your
nose.

Otrivin Natural Plus with
Eucalyptus naturally
unblocks your nose in
3 minutes and helps to remove bacteria.

Eucalyptus naturally
unblocks your nose in
3 minutes and helps to remove bacteria.
